channel.title: Help me please!
channel.description:
hay guys.
when ever i click login on local host to my server it kinda locks into the black screen bit but then goes back out to the login screen.
on the cmd it says: [code] connection accepted from 192.168.0.2: 2701 Client type: high memory version UserId: 1000 Mod Elvan is signing onto the server. LOADED: 3 Game saved for player Mod Elvan ClientHandler: Client Mod Elvan disconnected. [/code]
help please? i may need a tutorial or something made supplying the files to be edited and what to change to what.

item.title: Help me please!
item.dc:creator: @dds_asap dds asap
item.description:
@dds_asap wrote:

hay guys.

when ever i click login on local host to my server it kinda locks into the black screen bit but then goes back out to the login screen.

on the cmd it says:

connection accepted from 192.168.0.2: 2701
Client type: high memory version
UserId: 1000
Mod Elvan is signing onto the server.
LOADED: 3
Game saved for player Mod Elvan
ClientHandler: Client Mod Elvan disconnected.

help please? i may need a tutorial or something made supplying the files to be edited and what to change to what.

Read full topic
